connection.description: A Relay AWS connection to use

secretAccessKey.description: The secret key for the account

region.description: The default AWS region to use

stackName.description: The name of the stack to create or update

template.description: The body of the CloudFormation template as a string in YAML or JSON. One of template or templateFile must be specified.

templateFile.description: The relative path, within the Git repository given in the git parameters, to the template file to deploy. One of template or templateFile must be specified.

git.description: A map of git configuration. If you're using HTTPS, only name and repository are required.

ssh_key.description: The SSH key to use when cloning the git repository. You can pass the key into Relay as a secret.

known_hosts.description: SSH known hosts file. Pass the contents of the file into Relay as a secret.

name.description: A directory name for the git clone

parameters.description: A key-value mapping of CloudFormation parameters to pass to the template

s3.description: An S3 bucket mapping for your s3 bucket and template

bucket.description: An S3 bucket to upload the template to. Required for templates larger than 51,200 bytes.

prefix.description: A folder name to prefix the artifacts' file names with when it uploads them to the S3 bucket

capabilities.description: A list of capabilities to use for the deployment, such as CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM

tags.description: A key-value mapping of tags to add to the deployment.
